description: Rear roof extension and installation of replacement conservation style rooflight to rear roof slope, installation of timber refuse and recycling store to frontage, external alteration to front entrance path with tiles and dark slate.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Proposed Site Plan, Ground, First, Roof and Loft Plan drawing 2315-P/P/01A, Proposed Elevations drawing 2315-P/P/02A, 2315-P/W-S/01 and 2315-P/DL-W/01
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023)(Updated).

| The hereby approved rooflight to the rear roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021). policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and National Planning Policy Framework 2023 (Updated) - section 16.
